iron_ore.description: ore that can be smelted into iron bars in a blast furnace

iron_pickaxe.description: I wonder where this idea came from

rock_wall.description: a chunk of pure rock from the Temperate Cave biome

granite_wall.description: a chunk of pure granite, found in many biomes

stalagmite.description: rock spire that grows from the ground. Found in Volcanic and Temperate Caves

cave_grass.description: a common plant found in Rich Caves made from strong fibres

glow_bell.description: an alluring relative of the Blue Bell that glows faintly when held to UV light

torch.description: burning fuel on a stick to light the way!
